description: Detects the execution of a renamed ProcDump executable often used by attackers or malware
false_positives: Procdump illegaly bundled with legitimate software
Weird admins who renamed binaries (and should be investigated)
name: Renamed ProcDump
query: ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"procdump" OR (process.command_line.text:(*\ \-ma\ * OR *\ \/ma\ *) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-accepteula\ * OR *\ \/accepteula\ *))) AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(*\\procdump.exe OR *\\procdump64.exe))))
author: Florian Roth
